input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product features and product title.

Product title:
81stgeneration Genuine Vintage Satchel Shoulder Bag College Work City Casual Everyday Messenger Bag

Product features:
Dimensions: H 24cm, W 32cm, D 8cm. Adjustable strap length 143cm with buckle closure.
100% genuine goat leather which ages gracefully and softens with use. brand new bag may also have a distinctive leather smell which will fade with 4-6 weeks of regular use.
Flap over closure with buckle closure. 3 inner compartments and 2 inner zipped pocket, as well 2 external pockets with press studs.
Weight 650g.
This unique bag suitable for carrying iPad, festival day out, dinner, business meeting, everyday use.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The 81stgeneration Genuine Vintage Satchel Shoulder Bag is made from 100% genuine goat leather and features a flap over closure with buckle closure, 3 inner compartments, 2 inner zipped pockets, 2 external pockets, and an adjustable strap with buckle closure. This versatile bag is ideal for use as a work bag, casual bag, or everyday bag, and can be used to carry an iPad or other essentials for a day out or business meeting.
input_text.Response B: This vintage satchel shoulder bag is perfect for carrying your iPad, books, or even a festival day out! Made from 100% genuine goat leather, this bag softens with use and ages gracefully. The adjustable strap length of 143cm makes it perfect for carrying all your essentials, and the flap-over closure with a buckle closure keeps your belongings safe. The bag measures H 24cm, W 32cm, D 8cm, and weighs 650g. With its unique design and 100% genuine goat leather construction, this bag is not only practical but also a work of art. Whether you're looking for a new everyday bag or something more unique, the 81stgeneration Genuine Vintage Satchel Shoulder Bag is a great choice.

label_annotations.factors_b: Although B contains more deatiled information than A, it also says the bag is vintage (no claims for this in the prompt) and that it is a work of art - a subjective opinion.
